subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Derek Stepan had a hat trick for the Rangers, while Marc Staal shared the ice with his brothers Jordan and Eric of the Hurricanes for the first time in an N.H.L. game.
snippet: Derek Stepan had a hat trick for the Rangers, while Marc Staal shared the ice with his brothers Jordan and Eric of the Hurricanes for the first time in an N.H.L. game.
